450090.name: Fantasy Grounds - Top-Down Tokens - Darkwoulfe's Token Pack Vol 2
450090.description:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 24 280 X 280 pixel top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting both heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.
  • druid
  • rogue
  • ranger
  • fighter
  • sorcerer
  • barbarian
  • paladin
  • Eastern monk
  • Cthulanite
  • creepers
  • dark elves
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software. It will work with any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Doug Davison
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
